mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS ordersId, o.`no`, o.fullname, o.mobile, o.salutation, o.arrival_time, o.tail_money, o.total_money, o.create_date, o.payment_date, o.number, m.`name` AS merchantName, mg.`name` AS goodsName FROM ds_orders o LEFT JOIN ds_merchant m ON o.seller = m.id LEFT JOIN ds_merchant_goods mg ON o.goods_id = mg.id WHERE o.seller = #{merchantId} AND o.status in(2,7) ORDER BY o.payment_date DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT o.id as ordersId, o.`no`, o.mobile, o.`status`, o.fullname, o.salutation, o.arrival_time, o.tail_money, o.total_money, o.refund_money, o.create_date, o.payment_date, o.refund_date, o.number, m.`name` as merchantName, m.address, m.latitude, m.longitude, m.tel, mg.`name` as goodsName FROM ds_orders o LEFT JOIN ds_merchant m ON o.seller = m.id LEFT JOIN ds_merchant_goods mg ON o.goods_id = mg.id WHERE o.id = #{ordersId} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(1) as total FROM ds_orders o WHERE o.seller = #{merchantId} AND TO_DAYS(o.create_date) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
SELECT COUNT(1) as total FROM ds_orders o WHERE o.seller = #{merchantId} AND MONTH(o.create_date) = MONTH(NOW())
SELECT COUNT(1) as total FROM ds_orders o WHERE o.seller = #{merchantId}
